author: Microsoft
description:
In episode 3, discover how Global Objects is building the world’s largest library of photorealistic 3D object data using advanced AI, 3D scanning, and digital twin technology. 
 
By combining Azure’s global compute and storage infrastructure with NVIDIA’s accelerated computing, Global Objects delivers scalable, real-time 3D rendering and collaboration. Azure AI Infrastructure manage orchestration and data flow, while NVIDIA ensures efficient processing and visualization of complex 3D assets. 
 
Microsoft Azure and NVIDIA present Catalyst: a new series spotlighting the visionaries using AI to tackle global challenges.

Watch:
Episode 1 - Pangaea Data: https://youtu.be/yKPu8n42LPs
Episode 2 - Basecamp Research: https://youtu.be/IbN3ClySZsg

Audio Description: https://youtu.be/VszHVf7iiuU

Chapters: 
00:00 - Introducing Global Objects
2:35 - Digitizing the World’s Largest Prop House
5:07 - Collaborating with Microsoft Azure and NVIDIA
7:18 - The Future of Safety Training
8:52 - The Makin
title: Building the world’s largest 3D object library | Microsoft Azure and NVIDIA | Catalyst E3

author: Microsoft
description:
Global Objects is building the world’s largest 3D object library using AI, 3D scanning, and digital twins—powered by Microsoft Azure and NVIDIA. Discover how photorealistic 3D data is transforming generative AI, virtual production, and real-time collaboration.

title: Why AI needs 3D data to see the world
